item.title: San Mateo County names new health chief
item.description: San Mateo County Health will get a new chief when Louise Rogers retires in February. Colleen Chawla comes to the Peninsula from Alameda County.

item.title: Mueller to hold office hours to discuss tsunami response
item.description: San Mateo County Supervisor Ray Mueller, whose district includes the coastline from Pescadero to Pacifica, will hold office hour events over the next two weeks to get feedback from residents about the response to the tsunami warning last week.

item.title: Pacifica introduces new rules for short-term rentals
item.description: After years of discussion, the Pacifica City Council reached conclusions on revisions to the city's short-term rental ordinance. The new rules still require review from the Planning Commission and Coastal Commission before they can be approved.

item.title: Talk of the Town
item.description: Donating toys through HAULidays, celebrating neurodiverse families at #QuirkyXmas and grappling with recurring flooding in El Granada.
